title: The Vietnam War : unknown images
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Psychological aspects
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/War - United States
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: 25 years after the end of the Vietnam War, some of the conflict's most harrowing images can be seen in this documentary. Long forgotten pictures rediscovered in American Army archives, censured for their violence, or restricted by military secrecy. Unedited, identified by clapperboard, this raw material depicts war in its routine, the eye of the camera capturing a crack fighting force, from the world's most powerful nation, in disintegration.
